extract

Class WebScraper

  • java.lang.Object
    • extract.WebScraper

  • public class WebScraper
extends Object
    Retrieves documents from PMC. Please only use this on PMC articles from the open access subset.

        private static File DownloadFile(String path,
                                 int table_num,
                                 String type,
                                 int PMCID)
        Downloads a file
        Parameters:
        path - the url for the file
        table_num - the table number to save the file as
        type - the type of file (for example .xls or .xlsx)
        PMCID - the pmc id of the paper

      • extractPaper

        Extracts all tables from a paper
        Parameters:
        PMCID - the pmc id of the paper
        Returns:
        list of all files that would have been downloaded

                                 List<File> filesDownloaded)

        Parameters:
        path - url for webpage
        table_num - table number to start saving tables at
        PMCID - pmc id of paper
        filesDownloaded - list to add files to
